The Financial Products Team in BAI the CT&BIT Product and Process Group includes policy and technical specialists who have responsibility for most of the direct taxation legislation on subjects covered by the Savings and Investment Manual, including interest, the accrued income scheme, deeply discounted securities, collective investment schemes, and annual payments. The Financial Products Team is also responsible for all aspects of the direct taxation rules on corporate finance, including loan relationships and derivative contracts.
Responsibility for legislation on dividends and distributions lies with the CT Structure Corporation Tax Team.
If you need advice in connection with a marketed financial avoidance scheme you should contact Counter Advoidance. the Anti-Avoidance Group (Investigation).

Please follow the guidance on the CT&BIT intranet site on when and how to seek advice. If, within those guidelines, you need to get in touch, please contact Zain Shaukat on 03000 596053. Jenny McDougall on 03000 593627.
